channel.title: Functions on Documentation of php-simple-kafka-client
channel.description: Recent content in Functions on Documentation of php-simple-kafka-client

item.title: kafka_err2name
item.description: Description function kafka_err2name(int $errorCode): string {} Returns the name of the error Example php> echo kafka_err2name(88); UNSTABLE_OFFSET_COMMIT

item.title: kafka_err2str
item.description: Description function kafka_err2str(int $errorCode): string {} Returns the error message of an error code Example php> echo kafka_err2str(88); Broker: There are unstable offsets that need to be cleared

item.title: kafka_get_err_descs
item.description: Description function kafka_get_err_descs(): array {} Returns a full list of error codes and their description Result structure [ [ "code" => 88, "name" => "UNSTABLE_OFFSET_COMMIT", "desc" => "Broker: There are unstable offsets that need to be cleared" ], ... ]

item.title: kafka_offset_tail
item.description: Description function kafka_offset_tail(int $offset): int {} Returns an offset value that is $offset before the tail of the topic

item.title: kafka_thread_cnt
item.description: Description function kafka_thread_cnt(): int {} Retrieve the current number of threads in use by librdkafka
